mapper.insert: insert into shopentry(pid, sku_id, cat_id, addtime, num) VALUES ((select ps.pid from prod_sku ps where ps.sku_id = #{sku_id}), #{sku_id}, (select cat_id from shopcat sc where sc.uid = #{uid}), now(), 1) on DUPLICATE key update addtime = now(), num = num + 1
insert into integral_log(uid, igvalue, type, opertime) VALUES (#{uid}, #{usableIntegral}, #{type}, now())

insert into book(uid, rmbprice, mmdprice, totalrmbprice, totalmmdprice, integral) VALUES (#{uid}, #{param.rmbprice}, #{param.mmdprice}, #{param.totalrmbprice}, #{param.totalmmdprice}, #{param.getInteger})

insert into bookitem(bookid, mer_id, uid, book_no, address_id, goods_rmbprice, goods_mmdprice, topayrmbprice, topaymmdprice addtime, leaveword) VALUES (#{bookid}, #{book.mer_id}, #{uid}, #{book.bookno}, #{address_id}, #{book.totalrmbprice}, #{book.totalmmdprice}, #{book.totalrmbprice}, #{book.totalmmdprice}, now(), #{book.word})

insert into bookprod(bid, pid, sku_id, num, rmbprice, mmdprice) VALUES
(#{bid}, #{prod.pid}, #{prod.sku_id}, #{prod.num}, #{prod.price}, #{prod.mmdprice})
insert into book_oper(bid, type, oper_desc, opertime) VALUES (#{bid}, #{type}, #{operdesc}, now())
mapper.update: update shopcat sc set rmbmoney = (select ifnull(sum((select price from prod_sku where sku_id = se.sku_id) * se.num), 0) from shopentry se where se.cat_id = sc.cat_id), mmdmoney = (select ifnull(sum((select mmdprice from prod_sku where sku_id = se.sku_id) * se.num), 0) from shopentry se where se.cat_id = sc.cat_id) where uid = #{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE from shopentry where entry_id in #{id}
mapper.select: select c.cat_id, c.mmdmoney, c.rmbmoney, p.mer_id, (select m.mer_name from merchant m where m.mer_id = p.mer_id) mer_name, s.entry_id, s.num, date_format(s.addtime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') addtime, p.pname, p.homeimg, sku.price, sku.mmdprice, sku.sku_valname, (IF(sku.recsts = 'D', '3', IF(repertory = 0, '2', '1'))) prod_state from shopcat c left join shopentry s on c.cat_id = s.cat_id left join productsinfo p on s.pid = p.pid left join prod_sku sku on s.sku_id = sku.sku_id where c.uid = #{uid}

select ifnull(sum((select price from prod_sku where sku_id = se.sku_id) * se.num), 0) rmbprice, ifnull(sum((select mmdprice from prod_sku where sku_id = se.sku_id) * se.num), 0) mmdprice from shopentry se where entry_id in #{entry_id}

select p.mer_id, (select mer_name from merchant m where m.mer_id = p.mer_id) mer_name, sku.sku_id, p.homeimg, p.pname, se.num, (IF(sku.recsts = 'D', '3', IF(repertory = 0, '2', '1'))) prod_state from shopentry se left join productsinfo p on se.pid = p.pid left join prod_sku sku on se.sku_id = sku.sku_id where se.entry_id in #{entry_id}
select rate from rateinfo order by type
select backform, `value` from integral where type = '3' and state = 1

select (select mer_id from productsinfo p where p.pid = sku.pid) mer_id, se.sku_id, se.num, sku.pid, sku.mmdprice, sku.price, (IF(sku.recsts = 'D', '3', IF(repertory = 0, '2', '1'))) prod_state from shopentry se left join prod_sku sku on se.sku_id = sku.sku_id where entry_id in #{id}
select repertory from prod_sku where sku_id = #{sku_id} for update

select bt.bid, bt.bookid packid, bt.isevaluate, bt.book_no, bt.state,bt.mer_id, (select mer_name from merchant m where m.mer_id = bt.mer_id) mer_name, bp.rmbprice,bp.mmdprice, bp.num, bp.sku_id, (select sku_valname from prod_sku where prod_sku.sku_id = bp.sku_id) sku_valname, p.pname, p.homeimg from bookitem bt left join bookprod bp on bt.bid = bp.bid left join productsinfo p on bp.pid = p.pid where bt.recsts = '1' and bt.uid = #{uid}
and bt.state = #{state}

select bt.id bid, bt.bid packid, bt.pid, bt.sku_id, bt.goods_rmbprice, bt.goods_mmdprice, bt.goods_num, bt.state, date_format(bt.addtime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') addtime, date_format(bt.paytime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') paytime, p.pname, (select sku_valname from prod_sku where prod_sku.sku_id = bt.sku_id) propVals, (select b.paymentway from book b where b.bid = bt.bid) paymentway from bookitem bt left join productsinfo p on bt.pid = p.pid where bt.id = #{bid}
select rmbprice, mmdprice from book b where bookid = #{bid}

update prod_sku set repertory = repertory - #{map.num}, salenum = salenum + #{map.num} where sku_id = #{map.sku_id}
update productsinfo set inventory = inventory - #{map.num}, sell = sell + #{map.sell} where pid = (select pid from prod_sku sku where sku.sku_id = #{map.sku_id})
update bookitem set payprice = topaymmdprice, paytime = now(), ispay = 1, paymenttype = 2, paymentway = #{payWay}, state = 2 where bookid = #{bid} and recsts = '1'
update bookitem set state = 5, cancelreason = #{param.cancelreason}, canceltime = now() where bid = #{param.bid}
update prod_sku set repertory = repertory + #{map.num} where sku_id = #{map.sku_id}
update productsinfo set inventory = (select sum(repertory) from prod_sku sku where sku.pid = #{param.bid}) where pid in (select pid from bookprod where bookprod.bid = #{param.bid})
